name: CategoryTheory.braiding_hom_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : Type u
x : X
y : Y
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.BraidedCategory.braiding X Y).hom { fst := x, snd := y }) { fst := y, snd := x }
decl:
@[simp]
theorem braiding_hom_apply {X Y : Type u} {x : X} {y : Y} :
    ((β_ X Y).hom : X ⊗ Y → Y ⊗ X) (x, y) = (y, x) :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.braiding_inv_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : Type u
x : X
y : Y
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.BraidedCategory.braiding X Y).inv { fst := y, snd := x }) { fst := x, snd := y }
decl:
@[simp]
theorem braiding_inv_apply {X Y : Type u} {x : X} {y : Y} :
    ((β_ X Y).inv : Y ⊗ X → X ⊗ Y) (y, x) = (x, y) :=
  rfl
